document_data.mainbody: '''High Phantasmage''' was a title given to the governing ruler of [[Samarach]] on the [[Chultan Peninsula]].
document_data.History: These individuals were always highly skilled [[illusionist]] [[archmage]]s from [[Nimbral]]. They served their position anywhere from several years to decades before relinquishing the position to another. [[Meleghost Zoaster]] was the High Phantasmage as of the {{YearlinkName|1372}}.
